data.text: @mdamone21 Hi, we are working on your case 26124833 and we will contact you with an answer. Regards.

@carlosarias10 Hello Carlos, you will see available flights since 05 of August in the next link: https://t.co/3r1QXfBmTr, the requirements to be on board are in the next link as well: https://t.co/mfbTb2PJMX, let us know if you have questions. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel We will contact your via email in order to provide you more information about your case. Please wait for our contact. Regards.
@mdamone21 Hello, to assist you, please send us through DM more details of your request along with your full name and case number or E-ticket number. We look forward to your comments. Regards.

@ricurrency Hello, in order to verify the status of your booking, let us know via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hi, we've sent you a reply via DM. Regards.
@LagosJAntonio Hola, para poder asistirte necesitamos que nos indiques tu número de Travel Voucher y el nombre completo del dueño del Travel Voucher vía DM. Saludos.

@fredcfreitas1 We've checked in our internal records and the information linked to your travel voucher does not register. In order to proceed, send us the information previously requested via DM. We'll be expecting for your reply in order to validate. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hello, we didn't receive the information, please send us the requested information. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@fredcfreitas1 Hello, to assist you, please send us the travel voucher numbers and the owner's name through DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@Dawe81594464 We sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@Dawe81594464 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@Dawe81594464 We have sent you a response via DM. Regards.

@LATAM_BRA joins the financial reorganization process of the LATAM Airlines Group under the protection of Chapter 11 of the USA to ensure its operational continuity, as well as its long-term sustainability. Learn more at:  https://t.co/MWZwVen6Y4

data.text: @Dawe81594464 Hello, if you have a refund request please send us your ticket number via DM. We will await for your reply. Regards.
@destineybleu We've replied through DM. Regards.

@destineybleu Hi, bear in mind that our commercial operation is linked to the guidelines established by the government of each country. If you have the booking code or the ticket number, please provide it via DM, so we can check her reservation. Regards.
@bskubs Hello, in order to verify the described situation, let us know via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@FioreMastrangel Hello, we just sent you a reply via DM. Kind regards.
@fiorella_ballon Hola, te acabamos de enviar un mensaje vía DM. Saludos.
@Pamc2111 Hi, we have sent you a response via DM. Regards.
@EugenePhilips6 Hi, we cannot assist you with your refund because your tickets belong to a travel agency. Please contact them. Regards.
@RodNYC1 We've sent you a reply via DM. Regards.
@RodNYC1 Hi, in order to assist you, let us know your ticket number/booking reference along with the full passenger's name via DM. We'll be expecting for your reply in order to proceed. Kind regards.
@temphoranfix We replied to the message you sent via DM.
@temphoranfix We've replied to you via DM. Regards.
@temphoranfix Hi, we've sent you a reply via DM. Kind regards.

@Emily55101403 Hi, in order to provide you immediate assistance with this situation, let us know your ticket number/booking reference along with the full passenger's name via DM. We'll be expecting for your reply in order to proceed. Regards.
@Pamc2111 We replied to your message via DM.
@kmartnez_ Hi, in order to assist you please let know via DM your ticket number and the passenger's full name or your case number. We will be waiting for your response.
@mdamone21 Hi, send us a DM with details of your requirement and booking code to assist you. Thanks.
@Pamc2111 Hello, we sent you a message via DM, we suggest you to delete this message since it contains private information associated with your booking. Kind regards.
@breelutz0w Hello, to provide you better assistance, please send us through DM the complete passenger's name and booking code. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@alansouzati Hello, to assist you, please send us the complete passenger's name and booking code thought DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.
@_romualdoamaral Sentimos muito que algo tenha acontecido que mudasse sua percepção com a gente, Romualdo . Se quiser nos contar o que houve, talvez possamos ajudá-lo.
@icarumylove Hi, send us a DM with your booking code and name to assist you. Thanks.
@FioreMastrangel Fiorella, te contactaremos tan pronto como sea posible. Saludos.

@FioreMastrangel Hola Fiorella, aún nos encontramos trabajando en tu caso, agregamos las notas correspondientes solicitando agilidad y pronta respuesta. Apenas tengamos más detalles te contactaremos de inmediato. Quedamos atentos.

@caela_daly Hello, we have added notes in your case number in order to provide you a prompt answer. Once we receive an update, we'll contact you via phone call or email. Please stay tuned to your means of contact. Regards.

@FioreMastrangel Hello, we're still working on your case. At this moment we don't have the phone calls available. Here https://t.co/ZSOADk85Rc you can find customers service phone numbers. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel You can enter here: https://t.co/TaW7UJBe6N. Regards.
@FioreMastrangel We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@riccimena Hola, te hemos enviado un mensaje. Saludos.
@riccimena Hola, para asistirte puedes enviarnos un mensaje privado. Saludos.
@FioreMastrangel Hi, please send us a DM with your full name and booking code. Regards.
@rsdude Hi, in order to assist you, please send us more information about your request via DM. We will await for your reply.
@MusafirGhoom We sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.
@MusafirGhoom Hello, we replied via DM. Kind regards.
@MusafirGhoom Hello, we sent you  information via DM, we suggest you to delete this message since it contains private information regarding your reservation. Kind regards.
@temphoranfix We've replied through DM, regards.
@Felipe_Sozinho Hello, you could change the outbound and inbound flight without extra cost. Do not hesitate to write us back in case you need our help. Regards.
@satiriko However, we left your comments into the case to be evaluated and send you an accurate answer. As soon as we finish, we'll contact you with more details through your contact means. Regards.

@satiriko Hi, we are doing everything possible to accomplish our commitment, and we apologize for any inconvenience caused. But know for sure that we are working to speed up this process through your current case, and we remain aware of your comments. Regards.
@JamiePicken We have sent you a DM. Regards.

@caela_daly Hello, to verify that information, provide us via DM the reservation code, ticket number, case number (if you have it) and full name of the passenger. We'll be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
@itsmits_ Since you have connecting flight with a different airline, the purchase of the extra bags has to be done at the airport. Thanks.

data.text: @itsmits_ Hi, we suggest you to delete cookies or temporary files and try to purchase your tickets again. In case the problem continues, please send us more information via DM. Regards.
@MoFoTomO We sent you a message via DM. Kind regards.

@MoFoTomO Hello, in order to verify the information in your booking and provide you further assistance, let us know via DM your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers. We will be waiting for your reply. Kind regards.
https://t.co/dX6BKg3VDn

We are committed to keeping you informed, that's why we present to you the operational status of our main destinations. #NewWaystoFly More information at https://t.co/scPwbsjVXt https://t.co/on0DX9KnOr

@LYTam43375886 In order to verify the information in your booking and provide you a precise assistance confirm us your reservation code or ticket number and full name of the passengers via DM. Bear in mind that we are here to help you. Kind regards.

@LYTam43375886 Hello, if your booking is under the Travel Agency's domain, the reimbursement must be handled by them as the issuance channel. However, we can assist you with the modification procedure through this mean
Enjoy more flexibility with our #NewWaysToFly. We extended our rescheduling policies until Dec. 2021. Find out more here https://t.co/k6cQ3rmi9O https://t.co/FHLNCtLciR
@pag2u2 Hi, we have answered you via DM. Regards.
@JamiePicken Hi Jamie, send us a DM with details of your situation, so we can look into it. Thanks.
@mochi_mike99 Hi, let us check the information, please provide via DM, the booking or the ticket number (13 digits) and confirm the name/last name of the passenger. We'll be awaiting your response.
@PointsHolic Hello Evian, you will be able to access to the LATAM VIP lounge, if you are a Qantas or Qatar elite member. Regarding the luggage, it will be under your ticket conditions. Regards.

data.text: @KimPham__ Hi, we've replied through DM. Regards.

@KimPham__ Hi, in order to provide you further assistance, let us know your booking code or ticket number along with the full passenger's name via DM. Bear in mind that if your ticket was purchased through a third party, you must contact them directly to proceed with the reimbursement.
@FlavioS49583587 It was done yesterday and it is in process. Regards.

#AttentionPassengers: LATAM Airlines Argentina closes its operations in the country. LATAM Airlines Group and its other subsidiaries will continue serving routes to the US, Brazil, Chile, and Peru to connect Argentina to the world. More information at https://t.co/IArT5cqzMe

data.text: @FlavioS49583587 Hi, we are still working on your case 25873038 and we will contact you with an answer. Regards.
@MoFoTomO HI, we answered you via DM. Regards.

#ATTENTION: We have received alerts about offers and possible fraud through false accounts on social networks. We confirm to our passengers and users that LATAM only informs about its operations through its official channels. https://t.co/sXKxwtRui4

@VinsonChris Hi, in order to provide you a proper assistance, let us know your booking code/ticket number along with the full passenger's name or the case number linked to your refund request and email address via DM. We'll be expecting your reply to proceed. Regards.

@FlavioS49583587 We are still working on your case, we suggest you to remain tuned to your e-mail address, there you will receive further information (subject to evaluation) as soon as we have an update or resolution. Kind regards.

@FlavioS49583587 Hello, we are still working on your case number 25873038, there extra validations are being managed in order to provide you an accurate response. We added your comments in order to acknowledge the need for a quick reply, as soon as we have an update we will reach you via e-mail.
@OfficialZazaK Hello, to provide you a better assistance, please send us the complete passenger's name and booking code by DM. We look forward to your reply. Regards.

@JacobBrehme Jacob, we understand your position, and we guarantee you that we are still working on your request, however the process is taking longer than usual regarding the high demand in refund procedures. Kind regards.
@Beitoworld 💙❤
@ShaneYaniga We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@ShaneYaniga Hi, please send us a DM with your booking code. Regards.
@FlavioS49583587 Hello, your refund is still in process. Bear in mind that due to the Covid-19 some processes are taking a bit more. Once we have any update, we'll contact you. Regards.

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

data.text: @elsanto1979 Hi, in order to provide you further assistance, let us know your ticket number/booking reference along with the full passengers name via DM. Kind regards.
@loufoq_ We have sent you a DM. Regards.
@loufoq_ Hi, if you need assistance, please send us a DM with more details. Regards.
@jorgeluis_tuki In this case, we suggest you get in touch with our customer service line in the United States 1 866 435 9526. Keep in mind that it could be subject to a service fee. Regards.

@jorgeluis_tuki Hi, sometimes our website can be affected by cookies or temporary files, we suggest you clear your web browser's cache, cookies, and history and try again here: https://t.co/bF1rqF3NnK. Regards.
@FlavioS49583587 We are working on your request and will get back to you as soon as we have an update. Thanks.
@mardmc Hi, to assist you, please confirm via DM your travel voucher numbers and full name of the holder. We'll be waiting for your response.
@FlavioS49583587 Hi, we are working on your case. You can check its status here: https://t.co/Yfo3wjNnNk. Regards.

@JacobBrehme Hi, we understand your position as a passenger, currently your case is being managed and you will receive a assistance in regard to your request as soon as possible. Do not hesitate to contact us again in case you've an additional query. Kind regards.
